ActionSendSMS.Name: IFCFTSDynamicSMS
ActionSendSMS.Template: This is just a Sample Template For Statement Confirmation. Dear Customer, your Statement Ref# is :message/body/TLBF21_singleFl21 under A/C# ending with :__BCKACC03MSKFT has been sent.
